The more you resist the more often it will happen.

Just let it out of your system and you might be back to square one or grow to enjoy it enough to try and make it happen in real life.

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5555497e63687268e4000900#post_5555497e63687268e4000900
I guess?
Maybe?

I was insane in that dream. 
I went swinging on ropes around a small, made-of-trash kind of town that is located in the middle of an ocean on a broken, stone giant. The ropes (more like grappling hooks though) were stuck on a dismembered stone giant's finger, which was really big. Kinda like Kronos from God Of War 3, except more stone-like.
Apparently there was school in a warehouse, a teacher wearing a suit and glasses, and a cute girl with blonde hair, blue eyes, a hair clip and is slightly shorter than me. I think she's good with acrobatics. There were other people swinging ropes as well, maybe like the main transportation of the place.
I was wearing a superhero mask for some unknown reason and I was insane. I jumped off that giant hand (it was really tall) and I would grappling hook myself across the giant's body with the trashy tall buildings. The girl would do the same.
One time, I would try to make a jump and I nearly missed the giant finger. I had to hold the finger like I'm some cat trying to climb a tree. The teacher would say that I couldn't do it but I went "Fuck it, I fucking can!" and just jumped onto it.

Then everyone went to class and I think I woke up as the girl giggled a bit?
